settings.section_content: Wake up flawless in just 4 nights with Snoozy Silk Pillowcase! Crafted from 100% pure Mulberry silk, this beauty secret is recommended by dermatologists worldwide and has quickly become the hush-hush beauty weapon of celebrities and beauty experts. Not only will you sleep like a dream, you will see a noticeable difference in your skin and hair. Start your beauty sleep now and wake up to clearer skin and beautiful hair.

Hey loves! I'm super passionate about self-care and silk is just the most luxurious and mindful way to enhance our sleep experience and wake up feeling refreshed, rejuvenated, and ready to conquer the world. Join me on this dreamy adventure to prioritize self-love and true beauty sleep.

settings.title: VISIBLE RESULTS IN ONLY 4 NIGHTS
settings.content: Wake up with smooth, wrinkle-free skin and perfectly styled, nurtured hair. Sleeping on silk minimizes friction, offering real results and undeniable benefits. Not only will your skin be clean and hair styled for the day but nurtured for the long run too. Feel and see the difference in just a few nights. Your beauty routine will get so much easier, without lifting a finger.

settings.title: FROM MESSY TO FABOULOUS
settings.content: Bid farewell to bedhead and frizzy hair! Snoozy makes mornings a breeze by preventing friction and maintaining natural oils. Effortlessly beautiful, tangle-free hair is just one sleep away. It's not magic, it's Snoozy.

settings.title: SKIN SAVING BENEFITS
settings.content: Sleeping on silk is the best-kept beauty secret to silky smooth skin. Don't irritate your skin and lose nutrients to absorbent pillowcases like cotton and satin. Silk lets you get rid of sleep wrinkles while it preserves your skin's moisture. It's time to wake up like the glowing beauty you are.

settings.faq_question: Can I Wash My Snoozy Pillowcase?
settings.faq_answer:
Absolutely!Â It's best to wash your silk pillowcases once per week to get rid of perspiration, oil, dead skin, and bacteria. Proper cleanliness will help keep your skin clear and your pillowcase gleaming.

Be sure to use the delicate cycle or most gentle cycle setting on your washer. Use cool water, no higher than 30Â° Celsius or 84Â° Fahrenheit. The cooler, the better. Warmer water will break down your Snoozy's threading over time.

settings.faq_question: Can You Put Snoozy in the Dryer?
settings.faq_answer: The short answer is yes! Although it's recommended to air dry silk, you can save precious time by putting your Blissy in the dryer. Just becareful with extreme temperatures and follow these instructions. Once washed, place your Snoozy silk pillowcase in the dryer and set to the lowest temperature for up to 20 minutes. Remove your Snoozy pillowcase and let it air dry the rest of the way until completely dried.
